name: All of Us: His Story
storyline: Life's good at the gayest cafe in San Francisco, but it's not always easy. And facing your crush is even harder.
summary:
All of Us is the umbrella title for a pair of complementary books in the All of Us series.

Uniquely, the two books in the All of Us series released simultaneously with parallel and overlapping storylines. These are All of Us: Her Story, which features a female main character with a female love interest, and All of Us: His Story, which features a male main character with a male love interest.
